FuncDef:
The info-center log-storage-time command configures the log retention period.
The undo info-center log-storage-time command deletes the log retention period. The info-center log-storage-time command configures the log retention period. The undo info-center log-storage-time command deletes the log retention period. By default, the log retention period is disabled, and management logs cannot be maintained by time.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the log retention period.
The value is an integer ranging from 30 to 1095, in days.

ExtraInfo: After the log retention period is configured, expired logs are not deleted immediately. They are deleted only after the configured number of days.Only security logs, event logs, operation logs, and security service logs are involved in retention period management.
